Kaelen L. Medeiros is a statistician and data scientist. They're currently employed as a Data Scientist working the Quality Testing and Statistics Team at [**HERE Technologies**](https://here.com/) in Chicago, IL, where they often serve as an "internal consultant" to other teams to help design their sampling strategies and quality audit processes.

Kaelen has a MS in Biostatistics from the School of Public Health at [**Louisiana State University Health Sciences Center**](http://sph.lsuhsc.edu/). <br>

For more information about organizations and projects Kaelen is active in, see the Organizations tab.
